parameters.name: KMProvider
parameters.description: The provider of the KMS instance. Set the value to Aliyun.

parameters.name: KmsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the KMS instance that you want to enable.

parameters.name: VSwitchIds
parameters.description: The vSwitch in the two zones. The vSwitch must have at least one available IP address.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) that is associated with the KMS instance.

parameters.name: ZoneIds
parameters.description: The two zones for the KMS instance. Dual-zone deployment improves service availability and disaster recovery capabilities.
